_comment: Configuration file for optics textbook utility scripts

chapters._comment: Chapter mappings: Each chapter has a directory and main file. Keys are chapter numbers (1-11).

_image_extensions_comment: Supported image file extensions (without leading dot)
_naming_convention_comment: Template for standardized image filenames. Available placeholders: {chapter}, {position}, {name}, {ext}. Example: 03_07_lens_diagram.png
_image_optimization_comment: Settings for image compression and optimization (used by optimize-images.js)

image_optimization._max_dimension_note: Maximum width or height in pixels. Larger images will be resized.
image_optimization._quality_note: JPEG/WebP quality (0-100). 80 provides good balance of size vs quality.
image_optimization._min_size_mb_note: Only optimize images larger than this threshold (in megabytes)

_reports_comment: Configuration for report generation. All reports are saved to the output_dir (created automatically if needed).
